Variable Panel
On this page
Variable Panel
Debugging and understanding what your script is doing
while it's running
is practically a necessity when your script is doing something unexpected.
The Variable Panel is used to view all of active
Timers
,
Threads
, and
Variables
.
You can open the Variable Panel by pressing
ALT+V
or clicking the "Variable Panel" button in the Details Panel when you select your script or custom action's top most action.
Tips
â€‹
You can sort or search through all of your variables by clicking on the column headers or typing in the search box
You can click on some variables and they'll be highlighted in game, this includes:
Entities (like Players, NPCs, Game Objects, etc.)
Items
Widgets
Tiles and Areas
